--- select_literals_bytes.sql
SELECT
  B"abc",
  B'''abc''',
  b"""abc""",
  b"""abc\n""",
  br'abc+',
  RB"abc+",
  RB'''abc''',
  RB'''abc\n''',
  B"\000",
  B"\077\077\077"

--- AST
&ast.QueryStatement{
  Hint:  (*ast.Hint)(nil),
  With:  (*ast.With)(nil),
  Query: &ast.Select{
    Select:   0,
    Distinct: false,
    As:       nil,
    Results:  []ast.SelectItem{
      &ast.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &ast.BytesLiteral{
          ValuePos: 9,
          ValueEnd: 15,
          Value:    []uint8{
            0x61, 0x62, 0x63,
          },
        },
      },
      &ast.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &ast.BytesLiteral{
          ValuePos: 19,
          ValueEnd: 29,
          Value:    []uint8{
            0x61, 0x62, 0x63,
          },
        },
      },
      &ast.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &ast.BytesLiteral{
          ValuePos: 33,
          ValueEnd: 43,
          Value:    []uint8{
            0x61, 0x62, 0x63,
          },
        },
      },
      &ast.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &ast.BytesLiteral{
          ValuePos: 47,
          ValueEnd: 59,
          Value:    []uint8{
            0x61, 0x62, 0x63, 0x0a,
          },
        },
      },
      &ast.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &ast.BytesLiteral{
          ValuePos: 63,
          ValueEnd: 71,
          Value:    []uint8{
            0x61, 0x62, 0x63, 0x2b,
          },
        },
      },
      &ast.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &ast.BytesLiteral{
          ValuePos: 75,
          ValueEnd: 83,
          Value:    []uint8{
            0x61, 0x62, 0x63, 0x2b,
          },
        },
      },
      &ast.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &ast.BytesLiteral{
          ValuePos: 87,
          ValueEnd: 98,
          Value:    []uint8{
            0x61, 0x62, 0x63,
          },
        },
      },
      &ast.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &ast.BytesLiteral{
          ValuePos: 102,
          ValueEnd: 115,
          Value:    []uint8{
            0x61, 0x62, 0x63, 0x5c, 0x6e,
          },
        },
      },
      &ast.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &ast.BytesLiteral{
          ValuePos: 119,
          ValueEnd: 126,
          Value:    []uint8{
            0x00,
          },
        },
      },
      &ast.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &ast.BytesLiteral{
          ValuePos: 130,
          ValueEnd: 145,
          Value:    []uint8{
            0x3f, 0x3f, 0x3f,
          },
        },
      },
    },
    From:    (*ast.From)(nil),
    Where:   (*ast.Where)(nil),
    GroupBy: (*ast.GroupBy)(nil),
    Having:  (*ast.Having)(nil),
    OrderBy: (*ast.OrderBy)(nil),
    Limit:   (*ast.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT B"abc", B"abc", B"abc", B"abc\n", B"abc+", B"abc+", B"abc", B"abc\\n", B"\x00", B"\?\?\?"
